talk0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That is all I have on hand. Please wait
until I have processed more.
talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you.<sp:0:4:0>I will process this zonaite later.<sp:0:4:0>The resulting materials will be available to
you once the processing is complete.
talk_sky0008:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0100>Zonaite <clr:ffff>is a special mineral that can be
mined in great quantities far beneath
the land below.<sp:0:4:0>There are trace deposits of it on this
island as well. But they are limited to
this cave.<sp:0:4:0>Our society flourished by <clr:0000>processing<clr:ffff>
this substance into other materials.
talk_sky0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Zonaite <clr:ffff>is <clr:0000>processed<clr:ffff> by smelting it in
a furnace. <sp:5:0:0>It is thereby converted into
materials with useful properties.<sp:0:4:0>Two such materials are <clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_sky0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thank you for your patience. <sp:5:0:0>I will now
explain what sorts of materials the ore
can be processed into.
talk_sky0012:
Zonai technology is typically powered by
<clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_sky0013:
These occasionally solidify into a form
known as <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_sky0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Converting <clr:0000>zonaite <clr:ffff>into other useful
materials in this way is called <clr:0000>processing<clr:ffff>.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Greeting><clr:ffff>I am processing zonaite into other forms.<sp:0:4:0>I am willing to accept raw <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> in
exchange for processed materials.
talk_sky0015:
This is the <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> I mentioned. <sp:5:0:0>It is
a unique mineral that can be mined far
beneath the land below.
talk_sky0016:
There are trace deposits of it on this
island as well. <sp:5:0:0>But they are limited to
this cave.
talk_sky0017:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:ffff>Our society flourished by <clr:0000>processing <clr:ffff>this
substance into other materials.
talk0110:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Crystallized charges <clr:ffff>are a solidified form
of Zonai charges.<sp:0:4:0>We mainly use them as raw material in the
construction of <clr:0000>Energy Cells<clr:ffff>.
talk_sky0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are examples of processed
materials available on the nearby shelf.<sp:0:4:0>I encourage you to examine them to see
if there are any you want.
talk0140:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Please visit anytime you require
processed materials.
talk0141:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Please visit anytime you require
processed materials.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You do not have enough zonaite.
Please come again once you have
brought enough.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>I am detecting a large number of items in
your possession. I recommend disposing
of some of them.
talk0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you.<sp:0:4:0>I will process this zonaite into
new materials.
talk0120:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Zonai charges<clr:ffff> are what <clr:0000>power <clr:ffff>Zonai<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
devices and constructs.<sp:0:4:0>A charge can be consumed to <clr:0000>replenish
your Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_sky0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Apologies for not noticing you. <sp:5:0:0>I was
focused on processing <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff>.
talk_sky0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Zonaite <clr:ffff>is <clr:0000>processed<clr:ffff> by smelting it in
a furnace. <sp:5:0:0>It is thereby converted into
materials with useful properties.<sp:0:4:0>A few such materials will be ready for
your review shortly. <sp:5:0:0>Wait one moment.
talk_sky0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> is already slated for
processing.<sp:0:4:0>It would pose difficulties for me if you
took it for yourself.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>I am engaged in processing zonaite into
other materials.
